name: Yoo Ninja Rush - Jumping
description:
Yoo Ninja Rush is a milestone in the genre of endless racing. The gorgeous frame in this game will definitely make you love it. In this game, you control a awesome ninja, call it Funia if you like, to run on top of roof. Numerous of monsters will appear and attack you, and you have to avoid colliding with them or release darts to kill them. Plus, some pickups will also appear, such as a heart to increase your power, or an invincibility to protect you from being hurt by enemies. Traffic race is suitable for everyone to play, so download this funny game and share your score with your friends and families! To be a parkour master and an excellent ninja!!

See this vedio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpvQdznwGyY

FEATURES:
- Gorgeous frame
- Numerous of pickups are waiting for unlocking
- You can increase ninja’s power in the shop
- Leaderboard and Facebook is available to share your score with your friends and families
- Easy to play, difficulty of game can be selected
- Most exciting is the game is totally FREE! No In-App-Purchase! Buy whatever you want from shop use coins that collected in the game!


HOW TO PLAY
- Touch screen and hold to make your ninja jump
- Tap fire button to release a dart to kill enemy. Note that when the number of darts is zero, the button is gone, so make use of every dart
- The number of darts is shown on right top of screen
- To avoid colliding with enemy and losing a heart, you can step on top of enemy, you would not lose a heart by doing so.
